Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Complete SEO Audit Platform - Phases 1-18

Full dental practice SEO audit platform with:

- Site audit with page-level analysis and issue classification
- Keyword tracking with historical data and scheduling
- Local SEO geo-grid rankings with GBP comparison
- GBP standalone tool with Posts, Q&A, Reviews analysis
- Competitor analysis with backlink gap and SERP comparison
- ROI calculators \(SEO, Google Ads, Capacity\)
- AI SEO analysis with LLM mentions tracking
- Domain-centric architecture with archiving
- NextAuth authentication
- Inngest background jobs
- Sentry error tracking
- 818 passing tests

Tech stack: Next.js 16, TypeScript, Prisma, TimescaleDB, Tailwind CSS
